title: Iron Man 4: A New Beginning
image_desc: [Image Description in English only: A futuristic cityscape with towering skyscrapers and flying vehicles, showcasing a sense of technological advancement.]
narration: Welcome to the future, where technology has reshaped our world. In this presentation, we'll explore the exciting possibilities of Iron Man 4, a new chapter in the iconic franchise.

title: The Legacy of Iron Man
content:
Tony Stark's Vision
Advancements in Technology
Global Impact
image_desc: [Image Description in English only: A close-up image of Iron Man's helmet, showcasing the intricate design and advanced technology.]
narration: Iron Man, the brainchild of Tony Stark, has left an indelible mark on the world. From his groundbreaking inventions to his unwavering commitment to innovation, Tony's legacy continues to inspire.

title: Iron Man 4: A New Era
content:
**Column 1**: **New Threats**
Emerging AI threats
Global conflicts
Environmental challenges
**Column 2**: **New Solutions**
Advanced armor technology
Sustainable energy solutions
Artificial intelligence for good
image_desc: [Image Description in English only: A futuristic cityscape with Iron Man soaring through the sky, showcasing the advanced technology and potential for innovation.]
narration: Iron Man 4 takes us to a future where new threats emerge, demanding innovative solutions.  We'll see Tony Stark's vision evolve, tackling global challenges with cutting-edge technology.

title: The Next Generation of Iron Man
content:
New Suit Designs
Enhanced Abilities
A New Iron Man?
image_desc: [Image Description in English only: A sleek and futuristic Iron Man suit design, showcasing advanced features and capabilities.]
narration: Expect to see groundbreaking advancements in Iron Man's suit technology.  New designs, enhanced abilities, and even a potential successor to Tony Stark's legacy.

title: The Future of Iron Man
image_desc: [Image Description in English only: A wide shot of a futuristic city with Iron Man standing on a rooftop, looking out at the horizon, symbolizing hope and progress.]
narration: Iron Man 4 promises to be a thrilling journey into the future, showcasing the power of innovation and the enduring legacy of Tony Stark. Get ready for an epic adventure that will redefine the possibilities of technology and inspire generations to come.
